author: ETA PRIME
description:
In this video we take look at and test out the all new GPD Pocket 4 Running Bazzite OS, A Steam Like OS on this  8.8-inch Screen, Modular Full-featured Handheld AI PC! Powered by the AMD Ryzen Ai 9 HX 370 and backed by the RAdeon 890M RDNA3.5 iGPU and up to 64GB Ram!
The new Pocket 4 has a 144Hz 8.8 Display making it small enough to travel with but powerful enough to game!
